description: The floating ice hand will leave your party guests horrified in the best way, so calm them down with this berry-lemonade punch.
name: Poison Apple Punch Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a glove 3/4 full with water, tie a knot to seal and freeze until solid.
Place ice in a punch bowl. Add half each of the apple juice, cranberry juice, lemonade and lime juice. Stir to combine. Reserve the other half of the ingredients for topping up the punch bowl.
Cut the ice-cube hand out of the glove and place in the punch bowl.
Transfer strawberry topping to a piping bag. Run the piping bag around the rim of the punch bowl, varying the pressure to create drips of strawberry topping down the sides of the bowl.
